rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with Scandinavian minimalist decor and natural lighting.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open-concept living area integrated with dining space to allow for flow of energy as per Vastu principles. Large windows and skylights provide ample natural light.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: A functional Scandinavian kitchen with open shelving and integrated storage. Designed to promote a clear line of sight from the entrance, ensuring positive energy flow as per Vastu.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room and kitchen, allowing for an open and airy dining experience.

rooms.name: Washroom (Guest)
rooms.description: Functional guest washroom with streamlined fixtures.

rooms.name: Two-Car Garage
rooms.description: Spacious garage accommodating two cars. Exterior access designed following local building norms and minimalistic Scandinavian design.

openings.name: Main Entrance Door
openings.description: A modern door with glass inserts for natural light while maintaining privacy.

openings.name: Window Alcove near Living Room
openings.description: Large window ensuring ample sunlight and ventilation. Designed to optimize the room's orientation per Vastu.

openings.name: Kitchen Window
openings.description: A functional window providing natural light for cooking areas.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy yet spacious bedroom with built-in closets and large windows on the east for morning light. Decor is minimalist and uses neutral Scandinavian tones.

rooms.name: Servant's Quarters
rooms.description: Dedicated space on the upper level for household staff with essential amenities. Designed with privacy and functionality in mind.

rooms.name: Library/Study Room
rooms.description: Quiet retreat designed with Scandinavian minimalism. Contains bookshelves, a comfortable seating area, and ample natural light from west-facing windows.

openings.name: Staircase
openings.description: Well-designed staircase connecting the ground and upper levels. The placement follows Vastu guidelines to maintain energy flow.

openings.name: Balcony Access from Master Bedroom
openings.description: Provides an outdoor outlook and fresh air while respecting privacy norms as per local design codes.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: Contains storage for cleaning supplies and other utilities. Designed for practicality with minimalistic Scandinavian style.

rooms.name: Servant's Bathroom
rooms.description: Functional bathroom adjacent to servant's quarters, ensuring easy access and maintaining Vastu principles of alignment.

openings.name: Service Entrance Door
openings.description: Separate entrance for service staff. Designed to maintain privacy and adhere to local building codes.
